actions.description: The gargantua makes two Slam or Rock attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 15 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (3d12 + 8) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Slam

actions.description: 15 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (3d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Rock

specialTraits.description: At the start of each of the gargantua's turns, each creature of the gargantua's choice within 30 feet of it must make a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target sees the gargantua as a manifestation of the target's worst fears; it takes 17 (5d6) psychic damage and has the frightened condition until the start of the target's next turn. On a successful save, a target is immune to this gargantua's Weird Aura for 24 hours.
specialTraits.name: Weird Aura
